/**
 * Formats a Wikipedia title for display by:
 * 1. Decoding URI components
 * 2. Replacing underscores with spaces
 * 3. Handling special characters
 */export const formatTitleForDisplay=title=>{try{return decodeURIComponent(title).replace(/_/g,' ');}catch(e){// If decoding fails, just replace underscores
return title.replace(/_/g,' ');}};/**
 * Formats a title for use in URLs by:
 * 1. Replacing spaces with underscores
 * 2. Encoding URI components
 */export const formatTitleForUrl=title=>{return encodeURIComponent(title.replace(/ /g,'_'));};
